title: West Indies Guava Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: ['1 guava - peeled, seeded and chopped', '400g passata', '150g tomato puree', '125ml water', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons liquid smoke flavouring', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon habanero hot sauce', '1 teaspoon treacle', '1 tablespoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
